name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior PHP Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I excel in building high-performance solutions utilizing **PHP**, **Symfony**, **MySQL**, **PostgreSQL**, and **REST** APIs. I have a strong command of version control using **Git** and CI/CD practices to streamline development processes. My technical expertise extends to containrization and orchestration using **Docker**, which ensures reliable deployments and efficient resource management.

In addition to my backend proficiency, I possess a solid understanding of e-commerce platforms like **Shopify**, **Shopware**, and **WooCommerce**. My background in the healthcare and financial sectors has equipped me with a keen sense of compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS.

I also have hands-on experience implementing AI solutions and integrating machine learning workflows, ensuring that I can leverage advanced technologies for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. My ability to adapt quickly and work collaboratively in team settings has been instrumental in delivering robust and secure applications.
